Ski Pole Umbrella - A ski pole that doubles as an umbrella, providing protection from both snow and rain.
Ski Pole LED Lights - A ski pole with built-in LED lights, perfect for skiing at night or in low-light conditions.
Ski Pole Camera Mount - A ski pole with a camera mount, allowing skiers to capture their adventures on video or photos.
Ski Pole Bluetooth Speaker - A ski pole with a built-in Bluetooth speaker, allowing skiers to listen to music or podcasts while they ski.
Ski Pole Smart Sensor - A ski pole with smart sensors that can track temperature, altitude, and other environmental data, providing valuable information to skiers.
